DOC.detailed_description: The double-blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial carry eighty patient refer Department Periodontology , Isfahan School Dentistry . Main inclusion criterion : 1 ) Patients moderate severe chronic periodontitis 2 ) At least twenty teeth 3 ) Age 18 year . Main exclusion criterion : 1 ) History allergy macrolide group 2 ) History antibiotic therapy within 4 month ago 3 ) The lack patient cooperation . For patient initially perform scale root planning ( SRP ) . Oral health education give patient . After one month , patient randomly divide four equal group ( two test group two control group ) . Azithromycin ( AZM ) 250 milligram ( mg ) capsule , two time day ( bid ) , three day give test group . In test group , 1 % AZM gel locally injected periodontal pocket single-root teeth . Placebo capsule dose frequency give control group . In control group , placebo gel inject place . Clinical parameter include pocket depth ( PD ) , clinical attachment level ( CAL ) , papillary bleeding index ( PBI ) , periodontal disease index ( PDI ) , record baseline ( SRP ) , 1 , 2 , 3 4 month treatment . Using polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) , microbiological assessment percentage Porphyromonas gingivalis ( P.g ) Actinobacillus actinomycetemcomitans ( A.a ) randomly do 40 patient ( 10 patient group ) baseline 3 month treatment .
